name: Dick Dickenson's last case
description:
Unfortunately our WebBuild from Unity doesn't work correctly (something off about camera). So please check our PC build! It's only 50mb zip file and it's working correctly! <3 

---------------------------------------------------------------------

ScreaMortality 2021 game jam submission

Game itself is a horror themed puzzle platformer.

Control: AD - Moving
F - Pick up Flashlight
W/Space - Jump
S/CTRL - Crouch
Mouse - Directing Flashlight beam
LPM - Activating/Deactivating Flashlight
ESC - Pause Menu
R - Retry in some scenes
Q - Quiting in some scenes

Story: Help the Private Eye Dick Dickenson in his last case. After long months of pursuing evil cultists he finds out their base... But what may be unfolded inside? That's for you to discover!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits

Whole Art and Code is 100% created by us.

Art was made by Necisque

Code and Unity Setup was made by Jackoob

Sounds and Music is recorded and modified by Necisque, with 2 exception:
Rain sound is from freesound.org user: InspectorJ
One sound was recorded by our friend (Thx Daria <3)

Used fonts: 
Park Lane NF by Nick's Fonts 
Evil Empire by Tup Wanders 
Pixeltype by TheJman0205
